styles.css: & img {padding: var(--wp--preset--spacing--xxx-small); border: 10px solid transparent; background: conic-gradient(from 90deg at 1px 1px,transparent 25%,var(--wp--preset--color--gray-dark) 0); clip-path: polygon( 0 0 ,33% 0 ,50% calc(2*var(--wp--preset--spacing--xxx-small)) ,66% 0, 100% 0 ,100% 33% ,calc(100% - 2*var(--wp--preset--spacing--xxx-small)) 50%,100% 66%, 100% 100%,66% 100%,50% calc(100% - 2*var(--wp--preset--spacing--xxx-small)),33% 100%, 0 100%,0 66% ,calc(2*var(--wp--preset--spacing--xxx-small)) 50% ,0 33% );}
